resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103413</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103413</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versammlungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convenções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convenzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνθήκες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convenciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Conventions -- grammar, spelling, and the like -- are important to good writing, but should be taught only after the other Features of Effective Writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versammlungen -- Grammatik, Rechtschreibung und 
dergleichen -- sind zum guten Schreiben wichtig, aber sollten nur nach
den anderen Merkmalen des wirkungsvollen Schreibens unterrichtet 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les conventions -- grammaire, épellation, et 
semblables -- sont importantes pour la bonne écriture, mais devraient
être enseignées seulement après les autres dispositifs de 
l'écriture pertinente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As convenções -- gramática, soletração, e o 
gosto -- são importantes para a escrita boa, mas devem ser ensinadas 
somente após as outras características da escrita eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le convenzioni -- grammatica, ortografia e simili 
-- sono importanti a buona scrittura, ma dovrebbero essere insegnate 
solo dopo le altre caratteristiche di scrittura efficace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι Συνθήκες -- γραμματική, ορθογραφία, και όμοιοι -- 
είναι σημαντικές στο καλό γράψιμο, αλλά πρέπει να διδαχθούν 
μόνο μετά από τα άλλα χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα του 
αποτελεσματικού γραψίματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las convenciones -- gramática, deletreo, y 
similares -- son importantes para la buena escritura, pero deben ser 
enseñadas solamente después de las otras características de la 
escritura eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHLEEN CALI
FN:KATHLEEN CALI
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103413</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/conventions</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
